name: Soul Franky Swing Arm Boxing Solid
effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if your Leader has the {ODYSSEY} type and you have 2 or more rested Characters, set up to 2 of your Characters as active.
trigger: [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.
